# RandomForest

```{r}
library(caret)

fit <- glm(data=data,
           Label~.,
           family = binomial(link=logit))

vals <- round(predict(fit, newdata = data[, c("Exam1", "Exam2")], type="response"))

matrix <- confusionMatrix(as.factor(vals), as.factor(data$Label))
matrix$table

```
